WorkItem.Description: If I skill affliction 53/1/17 and want to save the spell priority: haunt corruption unstable affliction curse of agony and shadow bolt rawr crashes. Its crashes also if y do the spell priority first and than skill affliction if y want to skill haunt it crashes, too. PS: sry about my english^^

Comments.Message: I've experienced the same problem. I tried setting up my spell priority as haunt, curse of agony, corruption, unstable affliction, shadow bolt and every time I try it locks up.  I can set up Haunt, curse of agony, unstable affliction, and shadow bolt just fine but the problem seems to come in when adding in corruption.  I haven't attempted this with a non affliction spec so it is possible that the hang up is due to interaction with talents.
